pkgmetadata.longdescription: Utilize the Cross Scattering Transform (described in https://arxiv.org/abs/2207.12527) to synthesize Healpix or 2D data that is suitable for component separation purposes, such as denoising. A demo package for this process can be found at https://github.com/jmdelouis/FOSCAT_DEMO. List of developers : J.-M. Delouis, T. Foulquier, L. Mousset, E. Allys
